meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of mosquitoes.
meanings.sent1: The culicid larvae thrive in stagnant water.
meanings.sent2: The culicid population increases during the rainy season.
meanings.sent3: The culicid party in the garden was buzzing with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The culicid clouds darkened the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The culicid bites left itchy red marks on my skin.

meanings.definition: A mosquito or a member of the family Culicidae.
meanings.sent1: I heard a culicid buzzing near my ear last night.
meanings.sent2: The culicid landed on my arm and started feeding.
meanings.sent3: The culicid in the room seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The culicid danced gracefully in the air, avoiding swats.
meanings.sent5: The culicid's wings hummed softly as it flew past me.
